title: Can't seem to comment, says I have to be level 7 but I'm level 34...

replies.body: I think you already figured this out, but posting will update your forum level with your in game level. You can also use the [syncing tool](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool) to do it too.
I didn't know about the sync tool so ty for that.
No worries! If it ever happens again you can try that tool up at the top of H&S or simply try making a post or comment in here ^_^
